text: The overall thing which I've I've got at the top there in italics is that users dislike the look and feel of current remote controls ,

speaker: ME
text: so it has obvious design implications there .

speaker: ME
text: Um , we found that seventy five percent of users find most remote controls ugly .

speaker: ME
text: Eighty percent would spend more money when a remote control would look fancy ,

speaker: ME
text: we were quite surprised by that finding ,

speaker: ME
text: but um that's quite a high proportion of our our , you know , international target group are prepared to spend more money for something that's a bit nicer looking .

speaker: ME
text: Um , current remote controls do not match well with the operating behaviour of the user overall .

speaker: ME
text: For example , you can see below there , seventy five percent of users zap a lot ,

text: so again a big design issue there .

speaker: ME

speaker: ME

text: it's a slipping down the back of the sofa type of thing , uh

speaker: ME
